# sakura_auto_backup (Resource)

Manage an Auto Backup

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "sakura_disk" "foobar" {
  name = "foobar"
}

resource "sakura_auto_backup" "foobar" {
  name           = "foobar"
  disk_id        = sakura_disk.foobar.id
  days_of_week   = ["mon", "tue", "wed", "thu", "fri", "sat", "sun"]
  max_backup_num = 5
  description    = "description"
  tags           = ["tag1", "tag2"]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `days_of_week` (Set of String) A list of days of week to backed up. The values in the list must be in [`sun`/`mon`/`tue`/`wed`/`thu`/`fri`/`sat`]
- `disk_id` (String) The disk id to backed up
- `name` (String) The name of the AutoBackup.

### Optional

- `description` (String) The description of the AutoBackup. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]
- `icon_id` (String) The icon id to attach to the AutoBackup
- `max_backup_num` (Number) The number backup files to keep. This must be in the range [`1`-`10`]
- `tags` (Set of String) The tags of the AutoBackup.
- `zone` (String) The name of zone that the AutoBackup will be created (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of the AutoBackup.
